trans-unit.source: The axisartist namespace includes a derived Axes implementation ( mpl_toolkits.axisartist.Axes). The biggest difference is that the artists that are responsible for drawing axis lines, ticks, ticklabels, and axis labels are separated out from the mpl's Axis class. This change was strongly motivated to support curvilinear grid.

trans-unit.source: The new_mask array is computed recursively; at each step flat triangles are removed only if they share a side with the current mesh border. Thus no new holes in the triangulated domain will be created.

trans-unit.target: 的RCOUNT和ccount kwargs，其中两个缺省至50，确定在每个方向上使用的样本的最大数目。如果输入数据较大，则会将其下采样（通过切片）到这些点数。

trans-unit.source: The ContourSet to label.

trans-unit.source: The CubicTriInterpolator takes the value of the function at each node - provided by the user - and internally computes the value of the derivatives, resulting in a smooth interpolation. (As a special feature, the user can also impose the value of the derivatives at each node, but this is not supposed to be the common usage.)
trans-unit.target: CubicTriInterpolator在每个节点上取函数的值--由用户提供--并在内部计算导数的值,从而得到一个平滑的插值。(作为一个特殊的功能,用户也可以在每个节点上强加导数的值,但这不应该是常见的用法。)

trans-unit.source: The DPI (or resolution) for the file. This controls the size in pixels of the resulting movie file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的 DPI(或分辨率)。这控制着生成的电影文件的像素大小。

trans-unit.source: The DPI (or resolution) for the file. This controls the size in pixels of the resulting movie file. Default is fig.dpi.
trans-unit.target: 文件的DPI（或分辨率）。这可以控制生成的电影文件的大小（以像素为单位）。默认为 fig.dpi 。

trans-unit.source: The DPI (or resolution) for the file. This controls the size in pixels of the resulting movie file. Default is fig.dpi.
trans-unit.target: 文件的 DPI(或分辨率)。这控制了生成的电影文件的像素大小。默认为 fig.dpi。

trans-unit.source: The DPI to store in the metadata of the file. This does not affect the resolution of the output image.

trans-unit.source: The DPI to store in the metadata of the file. This does not affect the resolution of the output image. Depending on file format, this may be rounded to the nearest integer.

trans-unit.source: The Divider class whose rectangle area is specified as a subplot geometry.

trans-unit.source: The DrawingArea can contain any Artist as a child. The DrawingArea has a fixed width and height. The position of children relative to the parent is fixed. The TextArea is contains a single Text instance. The width and height of the TextArea instance is the width and height of the its child text.
trans-unit.target: DrawingArea可以包含任何一个Artist作为孩子。DrawingArea有一个固定的宽度和高度。子区域相对于父区域的位置是固定的。TextArea包含一个单一的Text实例,TextArea实例的宽度和高度为父对象的宽度和高度。TextArea 实例的宽度和高度是其子文本的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: The DrawingArea can contain any Artist as a child. The DrawingArea has a fixed width and height. The position of children relative to the parent is fixed. The children can be clipped at the boundaries of the parent.
trans-unit.target: DrawingArea可以包含任何一个Artist作为孩子。DrawingArea有一个固定的宽度和高度。子区域相对于父区域的位置是固定的。子代可以剪裁在父代的边界上。

trans-unit.source: The Figure instance supports callbacks through a callbacks attribute which is a CallbackRegistry instance. The events you can connect to are 'dpi_changed', and the callback will be called with func(fig) where fig is the Figure instance.
trans-unit.target: Figure实例通过作为 CallbackRegistry 实例的callbacks属性支持回调。您可以连接的事件是'dpi_changed'，并且回调将通过 func(fig) 调用，其中fig是 Figure 实例。

trans-unit.source: The GUI event that triggered the Matplotlib event.
trans-unit.target: 触发Matplotlib事件的GUI事件。

trans-unit.source: The GridSpec, which the subplot is referencing.

trans-unit.target: HPacker的子代是水平打包的,它在绘制时自动调整子代的相对位置。它在绘制时自动调整子代的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: The LatexManager opens an instance of the LaTeX application for determining the metrics of text elements. The LaTeX environment can be modified by setting fonts and/or a custom preamble in rcParams.
trans-unit.target: LatexManager打开LaTeX应用程序的实例，用于确定文本元素的度量。可以通过在 rcParams 中设置字体和/或自定义前导来修改LaTeX环境。

trans-unit.source: The LatexManager opens an instance of the LaTeX application for determining the metrics of text elements. The LaTeX environment can be modified by setting fonts and/or a custom preamble in the rc parameters.
trans-unit.target: LatexManager打开一个LaTeX应用程序的实例,用于确定文本元素的指标。LaTeX环境可以通过在rc参数中设置字体和/或自定义序言来修改。

trans-unit.source: The Legend class can be considered as a container of legend handles and legend texts. Creation of corresponding legend handles from the plot elements in the axes or figures (e.g., lines, patches, etc.) are specified by the handler map, which defines the mapping between the plot elements and the legend handlers to be used (the default legend handlers are defined in the legend_handler module). Note that not all kinds of artist are supported by the legend yet by default but it is possible to extend the legend handler's capabilities to support arbitrary objects. See the legend guide for more information.
trans-unit.target: Legend类可以视为图例句柄和图例文本的容器。由处理程序图指定从轴或图形中的图元素创建相应的图例句柄（例如，线，面等），该处理程序图定义了图元素和要使用的图例处理程序之间的映射（默认图例处理程序在 legend_handler 模块中定义）。请注意，默认情况下，图例仍不支持所有类型的美术师，但可以扩展图例处理程序的功能以支持任意对象。有关更多信息，请参见图例指南。

trans-unit.source: The Lifecycle of a Plot
trans-unit.target: 剧情的生命周期

trans-unit.source: The Locator class is the base class for all tick locators. The locators handle autoscaling of the view limits based on the data limits, and the choosing of tick locations. A useful semi-automatic tick locator is MultipleLocator. It is initialized with a base, e.g., 10, and it picks axis limits and ticks that are multiples of that base.
trans-unit.target: Locator类是所有刻度定位器的基类。定位器根据数据限制和刻度位置的选择来处理视图限制的自动缩放。一个有用的半自动刻度定位器是 MultipleLocator 。它以一个底数（例如10）进行初始化，并选择轴极限和刻度的倍数。

trans-unit.source: The Matplotlib datalim, autoscaling, locators etc work with scalars which are the units converted to floats given the current unit. The converter may be passed these floats, or arrays of them, even when units are set.
trans-unit.target: Matplotlib的datalim、自动缩放、定位器等都是用标量来工作的,标量是给定当前单位后转换为浮点数的单位。即使单位被设置,转换器也可以通过这些浮点数或数组来实现。

trans-unit.source: The Normal PathEffect's sole purpose is to draw the original artist with no special path effect.
trans-unit.target: 普通路径效果(Normal PathEffect)的唯一目的是绘制原画,没有特殊的路径效果。

trans-unit.source: The Normalization instance of this ScalarMappable.
trans-unit.target: 该ScalarMappable的归一化实例。

trans-unit.source: The Normalize instance scales the bin values to the canonical colormap range [0, 1] for mapping to colors. By default, the data range is mapped to the colorbar range using linear scaling.
trans-unit.target: 归一化实例可将二进制值缩放到规范的颜色映射范围 [0,1],以便映射到颜色。默认情况下,数据范围使用线性缩放映射到colorbar范围。

trans-unit.source: The Normalize instance scales the data values to the canonical colormap range [0, 1] for mapping to colors. By default, the data range is mapped to the colorbar range using linear scaling.

trans-unit.source: The additional parameters base, subs and nonpositive control the x/y-axis properties. They are just forwarded to Axes.set_xscale and Axes.set_yscale. To use different properties on the x-axis and the y-axis, use e.g. ax.set_xscale("log", base=10); ax.set_yscale("log", base=2).
trans-unit.target: 其他参数base，subs和nonpositive控制x / y轴属性。它们只是转发到 Axes.set_xscale 和 Axes.set_yscale 。要在x轴和y轴上使用不同的属性，请使用例如 ax.set_xscale("log", base=10); ax.set_yscale("log", base=2) 。

trans-unit.source: The alignment of the two objects is based on the bounding box of the Text, as obtained by get_window_extent(). This, in turn, appears to depend on the font metrics as given by the rendering backend. Hence the quality of the "centering" of the label text with respect to the dash varies depending on the backend used.
trans-unit.target: 这两个对象的对齐方式基于 Text 的边界框，如 get_window_extent() 获得的那样。反过来，这似乎取决于渲染后端提供的字体指标。因此，标签文本相对于破折号的“居中”质量取决于所使用的后端。

trans-unit.source: The amount to exaggerate the elevation values by when calculating illumination. This can be used either to correct for differences in units between the x-y coordinate system and the elevation coordinate system (e.g. decimal degrees vs meters) or to exaggerate or de-emphasize topographic effects.

trans-unit.source: The arrows scale differently depending on the units. For 'x' or 'y', the arrows get larger as one zooms in; for other units, the arrow size is independent of the zoom state. trans-unit.source: The button pressed. 'up' and 'down' are used for scroll events. Note that in the nbagg backend, both the middle and right clicks return RIGHT since right clicking will bring up the context menu in some browsers. Note that LEFT and RIGHT actually refer to the "primary" and "secondary" buttons, i.e. if the user inverts their left and right buttons ("left-handed setting") then the LEFT button will be the one physically on the right.

trans-unit.source: The classes here provide support for using custom classes with Matplotlib, e.g., those that do not expose the array interface but know how to convert themselves to arrays. It also supports classes with units and units conversion. Use cases include converters for custom objects, e.g., a list of datetime objects, as well as for objects that are unit aware. We don't assume any particular units implementation; rather a units implementation must provide the register with the Registry converter dictionary and a ConversionInterface. For example, here is a complete implementation which supports plotting with native datetime objects:
trans-unit.target: 这里的类提供了对将自定义类与Matplotlib一起使用的支持，例如，那些不公开数组接口但知道如何将自己转换为数组的类。它还支持带有单位和单位转换的类。用例包括自定义对象（例如，日期时间对象列表）以及单位感知对象的转换器。我们不假设任何特定的单位实现；相反，单元实现必须为寄存器提供注册表转换器字典和 ConversionInterface 。例如，这是一个完整的实现，它支持使用本机datetime对象进行绘图：

trans-unit.source: The color of the resulting image will be darkened by moving the (s, v) values (in hsv colorspace) toward (hsv_min_sat, hsv_min_val) in the shaded regions, or lightened by sliding (s, v) toward (hsv_max_sat, hsv_max_val) in regions that are illuminated. The default extremes are chose so that completely shaded points are nearly black (s = 1, v = 0) and completely illuminated points are nearly white (s = 0, v = 1).
trans-unit.target: 通过将阴影区域中的(s,v)值(在hsv色彩空间中)向(hsv_min_sat,hsv_min_val)移动,所产生的图像的颜色将变暗,或者通过将照明区域中的(s,v)向(hsv_max_sat,hsv_max_val)滑动,使其变亮。选择默认的极端值,使完全阴影的点接近黑色(s=1,v=0),而完全照亮的点接近白色(s=0,v=1)。

trans-unit.source: The cross spectral density \(P_{xy}\) by Welch's average periodogram method. The vectors x and y are divided into NFFT length segments. Each segment is detrended by function detrend and windowed by function window. noverlap gives the length of the overlap between segments. The product of the direct FFTs of x and y are averaged over each segment to compute \(P_{xy}\), with a scaling to correct for power loss due to windowing.
trans-unit.target: 韦尔奇平均周期图法得出的交叉光谱密度\（P_ {xy} \）。向量x和y被分成NFFT长度段。每个段都通过函数detrend进行去趋势化，并通过function window进行窗口化。noverlap给出段之间重叠的长度。将x和y的直接FFT的乘积在每个段上取平均值，以计算\（P_ {xy} \），并进行缩放以校正由于开窗导致的功率损耗。

trans-unit.source: The default antialiaseds is False if the default edgecolors="none" is used. This eliminates artificial lines at patch boundaries, and works regardless of the value of alpha. If edgecolors is not "none", then the default antialiaseds is taken from rcParams["patch.antialiased"], which defaults to True. Stroking the edges may be preferred if alpha is 1, but will cause artifacts otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用默认的edgecolors =“ none”，则默认的抗锯齿为False 。这样可以消除斑块边界处的人造线，并且无论alpha值如何都可以使用。如果edgecolors不为“ none”，则默认的抗锯齿来自 rcParams["patch.antialiased"] ，默认为True。如果alpha为1，则最好抚摸边缘，否则会导致伪影。

trans-unit.source: The expected signature on func and init_func is very simple to keep FuncAnimation out of your book keeping and plotting logic, but this means that the callable objects you pass in must know what artists they should be working on. There are several approaches to handling this, of varying complexity and encapsulation. The simplest approach, which works quite well in the case of a script, is to define the artist at a global scope and let Python sort things out. For example

trans-unit.source: The facecolors of the LineCollection. Setting to a value other than 'none' will lead to each line being "filled in" as if there was an implicit line segment joining the last and first points of that line back around to each other. In order to manually specify what should count as the "interior" of each line, please use PathCollection instead, where the "interior" can be specified by appropriate usage of CLOSEPOLY.
trans-unit.target: LineCollection的脸色。设置为'none'以外的值将导致每条线被“填充”，就好像存在一个隐含的线段，该线段的最后一点和第一个点相互重新连接。为了手动指定应该算作每行“内部”的内容，请改用 PathCollection ，其中可以通过适当使用 CLOSEPOLY 来指定“内部” 。

trans-unit.source: The figure manager sets up default key and mouse button press handling by hooking up the key_press_handler to the matplotlib event system. This ensures the same shortcuts and mouse actions across backends.

trans-unit.source: The framework can be used for both affine and non-affine transformations. However, for speed, we want use the backend renderers to perform affine transformations whenever possible. Therefore, it is possible to perform just the affine or non-affine part of a transformation on a set of data. The affine is always assumed to occur after the non-affine. For any transform:
trans-unit.target: 该框架既可以用于仿射变换,也可以用于非仿射变换,但为了速度,我们希望尽可能使用后台渲染器来执行仿射变换。然而,为了提高速度,我们希望尽可能使用后端渲染器来执行仿射变换。因此,我们可以在一组数据上只执行平移或非平移部分的变换。非正弦变换总是被假定在非正弦变换之后进行。对于任何变换。

trans-unit.source: The function applied to each segment before fft-ing, designed to remove the mean or linear trend. Unlike in MATLAB, where the detrend parameter is a vector, in Matplotlib is it a function. The mlab module defines detrend_none, detrend_mean, and detrend_linear, but you can use a custom function as well. You can also use a string to choose one of the functions: 'none' calls detrend_none. 'mean' calls detrend_mean. 'linear' calls detrend_linear.
trans-unit.target: 查找之前应用于每个细分的函数，旨在消除均值或线性趋势。与MATLAB中detrend参数是一个向量不同，在Matplotlib中它是一个函数。该 mlab 模块定义 detrend_none ， detrend_mean 和 detrend_linear ，但你可以使用自定义功能以及。您也可以使用字符串选择以下功能之一：'none'调用 detrend_none 。“平均值”调用 detrend_mean 。'linear'调用 detrend_linear 。

trans-unit.source: The graphics context provides the color, line styles, etc... See the cairo and postscript backends for examples of mapping the graphics context attributes (cap styles, join styles, line widths, colors) to a particular backend. In cairo this is done by wrapping a cairo.Context object and forwarding the appropriate calls to it using a dictionary mapping styles to gdk constants. In Postscript, all the work is done by the renderer, mapping line styles to postscript calls.
trans-unit.target: 图形上下文提供了颜色、线条样式等。请参阅cairo和postscript后端,了解如何将图形上下文属性(cap样式、join样式、行宽、颜色)映射到特定后端的例子。在cairo中,这是通过包装一个cairo.Context对象,并使用一个将样式映射到gdk常量的字典将适当的调用转发给它来实现的。在Postscript中,所有的工作都是由渲染器完成的,将行的样式映射到postscript调用。

trans-unit.source: The intended use is to have (x1, y1, x2, y2) in axes coordinates, and have transform_xy be the transform from axes coordinates to data coordinates; this method then returns the range of data coordinates that span the actual axes.
trans-unit.target: 预期用途是在轴坐标中具有 (x1, y1, x2, y2) ，并且transform_xy是从轴坐标到数据坐标的转换；然后，此方法返回跨越实际轴的数据坐标范围。

trans-unit.source: The interactive backends also provide the ability to rotate and zoom the 3D scene. One can rotate the 3D scene by simply clicking-and-dragging the scene. Zooming is done by right-clicking the scene and dragging the mouse up and down. Note that one does not use the zoom button like one would use for regular 2D plots.
trans-unit.target: 交互式后台还提供了旋转和缩放3D场景的功能。人们可以通过简单的点击和拖动场景来旋转3D场景。缩放是通过右击场景并上下拖动鼠标来完成的。需要注意的是,不能像普通的2D绘图那样使用缩放按钮。

trans-unit.source: The interpolation is based on a Clough-Tocher subdivision scheme of the triangulation mesh (to make it clearer, each triangle of the grid will be divided in 3 child-triangles, and on each child triangle the interpolated function is a cubic polynomial of the 2 coordinates). This technique originates from FEM (Finite Element Method) analysis; the element used is a reduced Hsieh-Clough-Tocher (HCT) element. Its shape functions are described in [1]. The assembled function is guaranteed to be C1-smooth, i.e. it is continuous and its first derivatives are also continuous (this is easy to show inside the triangles but is also true when crossing the edges).
trans-unit.target: 插值基于三角网格的Clough-Tocher细分方案（为了更清楚地说明，网格的每个三角形将被划分为3个子三角形，并且在每个子三角形上，插值函数是2的三次多项式坐标）。此技术源自FEM（有限元方法）分析；所使用的元素是简化的谢尔-科夫-托克（HCT）元素。其形状函数在[1]中进行了描述。保证汇编函数是C1平滑的，即它是连续的，并且它的一阶导数也是连续的（这易于显示在三角形内部，但在穿过边缘时也是如此）。

trans-unit.source: The interpolation is based on a Clough-Tocher subdivision scheme of the triangulation mesh (to make it clearer, each triangle of the grid will be divided in 3 child-triangles, and on each child triangle the interpolated function is a cubic polynomial of the 2 coordinates). This technique originates from FEM (Finite Element Method) analysis; the element used is a reduced Hsieh-Clough-Tocher (HCT) element. Its shape functions are described in [R0be0c58fd53f-1]. The assembled function is guaranteed to be C1-smooth, i.e. it is continuous and its first derivatives are also continuous (this is easy to show inside the triangles but is also true when crossing the edges).
trans-unit.target: 插值基于三角剖分网格的Clough-Tocher细分方案（更清楚地说，网格的每个三角形将被划分为3个子三角形，并且在每个子三角形上，插值函数是2的三次多项式坐标）。此技术源自FEM（有限元方法）分析；所使用的元素是简化的谢尔-科夫-托克（HCT）元素。其形状函数在[R0be0c58fd53f-1]中进行了描述。保证组合函数是C1平滑的，即它是连续的，并且它的一阶导数也是连续的（这易于显示在三角形内部，但在穿过边缘时也是如此）。

trans-unit.source: The intersection point t is approximated by two parameters t0, t1 such that t0 <= t <= t1.
trans-unit.target: 交点t由两个参数t0，t1近似，从而t0 <= t <= t1。

trans-unit.source: The interval is used to specify multiples that are appropriate for the frequency of ticking. For instance, every 7 days is sensible for daily ticks, but for minutes/seconds, 15 or 30 make sense.

trans-unit.source: The keyboard can also be used to select points in case your mouse does not have one or more of the buttons. The delete and backspace keys act like right clicking (i.e., remove last point), the enter key terminates input and any other key (not already used by the window manager) selects a point.

trans-unit.source: The largest increment is given by a triangle (or "flag"). After those come full lines (barbs). The smallest increment is a half line. There is only, of course, ever at most 1 half line. If the magnitude is small and only needs a single half-line and no full lines or triangles, the half-line is offset from the end of the barb so that it can be easily distinguished from barbs with a single full line. The magnitude for the barb shown above would nominally be 65, using the standard increments of 50, 10, and 5.
trans-unit.target: 最大的增量由一个三角形(或 "标志")给出。之后是整条线(倒钩)。最小的增量是半线。当然,永远最多只有1根半线。如果幅度很小,只需要一条半线,而不需要全线或三角形,半线就会从倒钩的末端偏移,这样就可以很容易地与单条全线的倒钩区分开来。上图所示倒钩的幅度名义上应该是65,使用50、10、5的标准增量。

trans-unit.target: ytick位置的列表。传递一个空列表会删除所有ytick。

trans-unit.source: The local variable (highest priority)
trans-unit.target: 本地变量(最高优先级)

trans-unit.source: The local variable (highest priority).
trans-unit.target: 本地变量(最高优先级)。

trans-unit.source: The location can also be a 2-tuple giving the coordinates of the lower-left corner of the legend in axes coordinates (in which case bbox_to_anchor will be ignored).
trans-unit.target: 该位置也可以是2元组，以轴坐标给出图例的左下角的坐标（在这种情况下，bbox_to_anchor将被忽略）。

trans-unit.source: The location of grid is determined by similar way as the SubplotParams.
trans-unit.target: 网格的位置是由类似于SubplotParams的方式确定的。

trans-unit.source: The location of the grid cells is determined in a similar way to SubplotParams using left, right, top, bottom, wspace and hspace.
trans-unit.target: 网格单元的位置以与 SubplotParams 相似的方式使用left，right，top，bottom，wspace和hspace确定。

trans-unit.source: The location of the key.
trans-unit.target: 钥匙的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of the key; additional explanation follows.
trans-unit.target: 钥匙的位置;下面补充说明。

trans-unit.source: The location of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 传说中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of the minor ticks. If None, reasonable locations are automatically chosen depending on the number of decades in the plot. See Axes.set_xscale/Axes.set_yscale for details.
trans-unit.target: 次要壁虱的位置。如果为None，则根据情节的几十年自动选择合理的位置。有关详细信息，请参见 Axes.set_xscale / Axes.set_yscale 。

trans-unit.source: The location of the minor x/y ticks. If None, reasonable locations are automatically chosen depending on the number of decades in the plot. See Axes.set_xscale / Axes.set_yscale for details.
trans-unit.target: 次要x / y刻度的位置。如果为None，则根据图中的几十年数自动选择合理的位置。有关详细信息，请参见 Axes.set_xscale / Axes.set_yscale 。

trans-unit.source: The location of the minor xticks. If None, reasonable locations are automatically chosen depending on the number of decades in the plot. See Axes.set_xscale for details.
trans-unit.target: 次要提要的位置。如果为None，则根据图中的几十年数自动选择合理的位置。有关详细信息，请参见 Axes.set_xscale 。

trans-unit.source: The location of the minor yticks. If None, reasonable locations are automatically chosen depending on the number of decades in the plot. See Axes.set_yscale for details.
trans-unit.target: 未成年人的位置。如果为None，则根据图中的几十年数自动选择合理的位置。有关详细信息，请参见 Axes.set_yscale 。

trans-unit.source: The location or locations to place the patches in the collection along the zdir axis. Default: 0.
trans-unit.target: 沿zdir轴在集合中放置补丁的位置。默认值：0

trans-unit.source: The locator is used to determine the contour levels if they are not given explicitly via levels. Defaults to MaxNLocator.
trans-unit.target: 如果未通过等级明确给出轮廓等级，则使用该定位器确定轮廓等级。默认为 MaxNLocator 。

trans-unit.source: The locked value for x0, or None to leave unlocked.
trans-unit.target: x0的锁定值,或者无锁定。

trans-unit.source: The locked value for x1, or None to leave unlocked.
trans-unit.target: x1的锁定值,或者无锁定。

trans-unit.source: The locked value for y0, or None to leave unlocked.
trans-unit.target: y0的锁定值,或者无锁定。

trans-unit.source: The locked value for y1, or None to leave unlocked.
trans-unit.target: y1的锁定值,或者无锁定。

trans-unit.source: The log level of the handler.
trans-unit.target: 处理器的日志级别。

trans-unit.source: The lookup table is generated using linear interpolation for each primary color, with the 0-1 domain divided into any number of segments.
trans-unit.target: 查找表采用线性插值的方式生成每一种原色,0-1域划分为任意数量的段。
